mapper.select: SELECT MEMO_SN, MEMO_EMPL_ID, MEMO_SJ, MEMO_CN, MEMO_WRTNG_DATE, COMMON_CODE_FIXING_AT, COMMON_CODE_BKMK_AT FROM MEMO
SELECT MEMO_SN, MEMO_EMPL_ID, MEMO_SJ, MEMO_CN, MEMO_WRTNG_DATE, COMMON_CODE_FIXING_AT, COMMON_CODE_BKMK_AT FROM MEMO WHERE MEMO_SN=#{memoSn}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMO(MEMO_SN, MEMO_EMPL_ID, MEMO_SJ, MEMO_CN, MEMO_WRTNG_DATE, COMMON_CODE_FIXING_AT, COMMON_CODE_BKMK_AT) VALUES(MEMO_SN.NEXTVAL, #{memoEmplId}, #{memoSj}, #{memoCn}, sysdate, 'MEMO011', 'MEMO021')
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMO SET MEMO_SJ = #{memoSj}, MEMO_CN = #{memoCn}, MEMO_WRTNG_DATE = #{memoWrtngDate}, COMMON_CODE_FIXING_AT = #{commonCodeFixingAt}, COMMON_CODE_BKMK_AT = #{commonCodeBkmkAt} WHERE MEMO_SN = #{memoSn}
